title: If anyone is wondering how to get f.e.k for boards

embed.description: Latest FEK Release: October 31, 2014 If you don't have a Script Manager, you won't be able to use FEK so please read the rest of the post. Click here to download the latest version of FEK! What is F.E.K.? First things first, here's a comparison picture. The Boards without FEK.

body:
You need to download f.e.k 3.0

Have fun!

Id like to give credit for goldentomat0 for giving me this link.

replies.body: wow you don't even give credit to me for telling you.
F.e.k. bugs OP. Mastermirkinen is now waiting for gold like me :)

FEK for the Boards was originally created with "Chronological Format" in mind.

Because of this, I wasn't keeping track of the "Discussion Format" bugs which there are many of.
